thread.title: People are freaking out over a photo of Kellyanne Conway in the Oval Office
thread.title_full: People are freaking out over a photo of Kellyanne Conway in the Oval Office

author: David Choi
title: People are freaking out over a photo of Kellyanne Conway in the Oval Office
text:
print 
Twitter is alive with the sound of outrage after Kellyanne Conway, counselor to President Donald Trump, was seen in a series of photos taken by photographers in the Oval Office on Monday. 
In the photos, Conway can be seen kneeling on a couch and taking pictures of Trump during his meeting with the leaders of some historically black colleges and universities. 
Pablo Martinez Monsivais/AP After Agence France-Presse posted the image on Twitter, commenters were quick to weigh in. Some people suggested Conway's disposition hinted at a deeper meaning: 
Now, you can't expect us to take this "meeting" seriously when this is the setting. pic.twitter.com/IAx34PlliM
